titles.title: A resolution to provide for electronic voting in the Senate.

action.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Over, Under the Rule.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Amends rule XII of the Standing Rules of the Senate to provide for roll call voting by electronic device whenever the Majority Leader, with the concurrence of the Minority Leader, requests such a vote. Sets forth time limitations for such votes.
